\item 
void \mbox{\hyperlink{class_line_sensor_model_a055567b171c5405d2af8f3ac729e058a}{update}} () override
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Update object with sensor readings, this function is called every frame (\texorpdfstring{$\sim$}{\string~}10ms) and should be used to stash expensive, one time computations before all the particles are calculated, this always runs before p(x) each frame. \end{DoxyCompactList}\item 
std\+::optional$<$ double $>$ \mbox{\hyperlink{class_line_sensor_model_ad378fe5e9415e7b9df1e2e1e62f93716}{p}} (const Eigen\+::\+Vector3f \&x) override
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Determine p(z\+\_\+k, x\+\_\+k). This is the chance that this sensor reading (z\+\_\+k) would occur given the robot would be at that particle (x\+\_\+k). \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}

Determine p(z\+\_\+k, x\+\_\+k). This is the chance that this sensor reading (z\+\_\+k) would occur given the robot would be at that particle (x\+\_\+k).

\Hypertarget{class_line_sensor_model_a055567b171c5405d2af8f3ac729e058a}\label{class_line_sensor_model_a055567b171c5405d2af8f3ac729e058a} 
\index{LineSensorModel@{LineSensorModel}!update@{update}}
\index{update@{update}!LineSensorModel@{LineSensorModel}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{update()}{update()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily void Line\+Sensor\+Model\+::update (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}{ }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}, {\ttfamily [override]}, {\ttfamily [virtual]}}



Update object with sensor readings, this function is called every frame (\texorpdfstring{$\sim$}{\string~}10ms) and should be used to stash expensive, one time computations before all the particles are calculated, this always runs before p(x) each frame. 



Implements \mbox{\hyperlink{class_sensor_model_a28672cf65d6e6a9bc967e5661d26e21e}{Sensor\+Model}}.
